section.title: SenseTupleRelation relation type
section.para: Represents a directed pair of two senses (typically - but not necessarily - belonging to two different entries). Recommended for representing pairs of hypernym/hyponym, broader/narrower, holonym/meronym.

listitem.para: Can be constrained and mapped to external authorities by the DMLex Controlled Vocabularies Module.
the first Sense of the pair
the second Sense of the pair
